documentation.text:
@dev Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop
 mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account.
 This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the
 modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to
 the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be pausable by
 simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.
@dev Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.
@dev Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.
@dev Initializes the contract in unpaused state.
@dev Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.
state variables
An enumarable list of book ids mapped to their prices
@return the number of books owned by an address
modifiers

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)

documentation.text: events
Used to get the address of the contract holding the books

function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))
function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)
function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)
function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)
function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
Gets all the bookIds, bookPrices, and URIs of books owned by an address
 Each index in the return values except URIs contain the information of a single book

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256,uint256)

documentation.text: Pauses the buy function and is only callable by the contract owner
Pauses the withdraw function and is only callable by the contract owner
Unpauses the buy function and is only callable by the contract owner
Unpauses the withdraw function and is only callable by the contract owner

devdoc.details: Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account. This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be pausable by simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.

WithdrawPaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

WithdrawUnpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract in unpaused state.

withdrawPaused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.
